title: IPropertyManagerPageListbox.IGetSelectedItems
description: Gets the items selected in a list box enabled for multiple selections.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of shorts of the currently selected items in this list box VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Each item is a 0-based index into the list of items.
Call
IPropertyManagerPageListbox::GetSelectedItemsCount
to size the returned array.
